suggestions.original: To improve the line texture in the artwork, consider incorporating more varied and intricate line work within the figures and background. Adding details such as patterns on clothing, textures on the mountains, and more defined features on the flowers and airplane can enhance visual interest. Experiment with different line weights and styles to create depth and dimension, making the overall composition more dynamic and engaging.
